text:
It was subtle./ I couldnt've picked/ Myself out of that crowd.

/ Even the tropical/ Flavors played along,/ Faded themselves/ As a favor/ To blend/ With our muted vanity.

/ Blue is black is gray is blue.

/ Nothing gave much of a mutiny:/ Not the woodworked ceiling,/ Not the plastered moments/ Of artistic explosions/ Hanging in hunted trophy style.

/ We mostly settled.

/ Ate a slice or two of pricey bread./
